data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: At Harry's first Quidditch match, Seamus, Neville, and Dean have made a banner that reads "Potter for President". Dean, who ____ apparently ____ of ____ artist, had ____ the Gryffindor lion ____ that, and Hermione had ____ it ____ that ____ paint ____ different ____. When ____ Snitch ____ appears, Harry ____ about ____ grab ____ when ____ is ____ by Marcus Flint, the Slytherin team ____. Dean demands that the ref send Flint off, and Ron explains that you can't do that in Quidditch.
data.partBlankContent: At Harry's first Quidditch match, Seamus, Neville, and Dean have made a banner that reads "Potter for President". Dean, who i_ apparently some_____ of a_ artist, had pai____ the Gryffindor lion under_____ that, and Hermione had cha____ it s_ that t__ paint fla____ different col___. When t__ Snitch fi___ appears, Harry i_ about t_ grab i_ when h_ is fou___ by Marcus Flint, the Slytherin team cap____. Dean demands that the ref send Flint off, and Ron explains that you can't do that in Quidditch.
data.answer: 在哈利的第一次魁地奇比赛上，西莫、纳威和迪安做了一个横幅，上面写着“波特当总统”。迪安显然是个艺术家，他在那下面画了格兰芬多的狮子，赫敏对它施了魔法，使它闪现出不同的颜色。金色飞贼第一次出现时，哈利正要抓住它，却被斯莱特林队队长马库斯·弗林特犯规。迪安要求裁判把弗林特罚下场，罗恩解释说在魁地奇比赛中不能这么做。
